name: "Cheers" Take Three Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 3 | 25 Questions

questions.text: The first episode of season three introduced Dr. Frasier Crane. Who plays him?
questions.explanation:
Kelsey Grammer.

	David Hyde Pierce plays Niles on "Frasier". John Mahoney plays Martin on "Frasier". Dan Hedaya played Carla's ex-husband, Nick Tortelli.

questions.text: Frasier uses psychology on Diane to get her to return to work at "Cheers."
questions.explanation:
False.

	It was Coach that used psychology on Diane, Frasier and Sam to get Diane back to "Cheers". He convinced Diane that Sam would start to drink again without her at the bar. Then he convinced Sam that Diane would go back to the mental hospital without working at the bar. Then he convinced Frasier that Diane would always think about Sam if she left then instead of staying to work at the bar. Not bad for a man who people would say isn't playing with a full deck, non?

questions.text: What does Diane call out when she's with Sam in "I Call Your Name"?
questions.explanation:
Oh, Frasier.

	She does this to get back at Sam. When Sam found out she's been calling his name out when she was with Frasier, Sam teases her saying she's still in love with him.

questions.text: In "Fairy Tales Can Come True" who does Cliff dress up as for Halloween?
questions.explanation:
Ponce de Leon.

	He dated Tinkerbell in that episode. They agreed to meet without their costumes the next day, but Tinkerbell got nervous and didn't show up. Later she called and they did meet, and dance.

questions.text: Who shot Sam in "Sam Turns the Other Cheek"?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Marvin was the jealous husband. Sam was seeing his wife, but he broke it off with her as soon as he found out she was married. Sam won't date three types of woman after all: married, underage and comatose. However, Marvin comes to the bar intending to shoot Sam, but Sam calms him down and gets the gun. Then Sam puts it in his back pocket and it goes off, so Sam ends up shooting himself.

questions.text: In "Coach In Love" Parts I and II is the girl Coach falls in love with named Irene or Sue?
questions.explanation:
Irene.

	Irene was played by Betty Ford.

questions.text: By the end of "Coach In Love" Part II, which of the following happened?
questions.correct: Coach answers the phone telling the person on the other end it won't work out
options: Coach gets drunk to drowned out his sorrows
Sam finally gets Sue to go out with him
questions.explanation:
Coach answers the phone telling the person on the other end it won't work out.

	Coach tells Sam and Diane he didn't have to hear Irene's voice, he just knew it was her on the other end.

questions.text: What is Frasier's mother's name in "Diane Meets Mom"?
questions.explanation:
Hester Crane.

	Lilith Crane was Frasier's wife. Marris Crane was his brother Niles' wife on "Frasier". I made up Madelyn Crane. Hester Crane was played by Nancy Marchand.

questions.text: Who is Carla's oldest child?
questions.explanation:
Anthony.

	Carla has 8 children. In order they are: Anthony, Seraphina, Gino, Anne Marie, Lucia,Ludlow, and the twins Jesse and Elvis.

questions.text: In "Diane's Allergy" who first says Diane's allergy is psychosomatic?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam says that Diane isn't allergic to Frasier's dog, but rather the sneezing is because she doesn't want to live with Frasier. Diane and Frasier do not want to believe this. Diane doesn't want to believe it because she wants to live with Frasier, and doesn't want to accept she might be scared. Frasier doesn't want to accept it because Sam thought of it first and Sam's just a bar tender after all.

questions.text: In "Peterson Crusoe" where does Norm go?
questions.explanation:
Sam's office.

	He sends postcards saying he's having a lot of fun in Bora Bora. He got scared however, and never left, he had been hiding out in Sam's office.

questions.text: Who plays Amanda in "A Ditch in Time"?
questions.explanation:
Carol Kane.

	Carol Kane can also be seen in "The Princess Bride" as Miracle Max's wife. She also played Latka's wife in "Taxi."

questions.text: In "Whodunit?" Carla becomes pregnant with Dr. Ludlow's child. Which child is it?
questions.explanation:
sixth.

	She named that child Ludlow after his father.

questions.text: In the "Heart is a Lonely Snipehunter" who does the gang take on a snipe hunt?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Frasier figures out that there is no such thing as a snipe, but he goes along with it with plans to get them back later.

questions.text: Everyone (ie. all the men) is upset with Sam when he starts winning against the Playboy Playmates in "King of the Hill".
questions.explanation:
True.

	The guys at the bar want the Playboy Playmates to get hits so they can run around the bases. Sam at first want to see them run too, but then his competitive nature kicks in, and he wants to win.

questions.text: Who knows more state capitals at the end of "Teacher's Pet" Sam or Diane?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam was getting good grades by sleeping with the teacher, but then he feels guilty about it, and Coach helps him study. He gets a D on the test, but he does know more capitals than Diane.

questions.text: Norm goes to jail for helping Cliff deliver mail when he's sick. What does Norm make Cliff do to get back at him?
questions.correct: Stand on a bar stool with his pants around his ankles while barking like a seal
options: Play a game of pool against him using his mouth to hold the cue stick.
Sing the "Ave Maria" while drinking water
questions.explanation:
Stand on a bar stool with his pants around his ankles while barking like a seal.

	Cliff didn't think it was a big deal to let Norm go to jail, he was more concerned that he would get in trouble than about Norm.

questions.text: In "Behind Every Great Man" what is the name of the reporter from the "Boston Scene" magazine?
questions.explanation:
Paula.

	Paula was played by Alison La Placa.

questions.text: Who plays Nick Tortelli?
questions.correct: Dan Hedya & Dan Hedaya & Daniel Hedaya
questions.explanation:
Dan Hedya & Dan Hedaya & Daniel Hedaya.

	Nick was Carla's ex-husband and the father of 5 of her children.

questions.text: Norm almost gets fired by his boss Mr. Heckt, instead he gets a promotion. What title did he get with his promotion?
options: Vice President in Charge of Dead Beats
questions.explanation:
Executive Executioner.

	Norm's promotion made him the man who fires executives. Mr. Heckt didn't want to have to do it himself, and saw that Norm was a sensitive man so he made the people feel better about being fired.

questions.text: Which "Seinfeld" star guest starred on "Cheers"?
questions.explanation:
Michael Richards.

	Michael Richard's played Eddie. Eddie bet Sam the bar that Sam couldn't marry Jacqueline Bissett.

questions.text: Diane goes to Europe with Sam.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Diane goes to Europe with Frasier.

questions.text: In "The Bartender's Tale" we learn that Carolyn hates something, what does she hate?
questions.explanation:
sex.

	Carolyn says that her mom lost three husbands in bed, which is why she hates sex.

questions.text: Who is the teacher that Carla hated in school?
questions.explanation:
Drusilla DiMegilo.

	Carla wants to get back at her teacher, and she tells Sam that she talked to her. She says the teacher had to do what she did to make them good students. Then Carla said she was gonna get her back, and God was testing her, but she passed. Right after that Drusilla comes out with half her head shaved and Carla says "I said I passed Sammy I didn't say I aced it."

questions.text: Who proposes to Diane in "Rescue Me"?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Diane says yes, but of course, as we'll find out later, they don't get married.
